channel.title: DFG on RD's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in DFG on RD's Blog

item.title: Identification of a Major Determinant for Serine-Threonine Kinase Phosphoacceptor Specificity
item.description: Notes on 2014 Cell paper that identifies the ‘DFG+1’ residue as a key determinant of Ser/Thr kinase phosphoacceptor specificity, with structural and biochemical validation.

item.title: Identification of a Major Determinant for Serine-Threonine Kinase Phosphoacceptor Specificity
item.description: Notes on 2014 Cell paper that identifies the ‘DFG+1’ residue as a key determinant of Ser/Thr kinase phosphoacceptor specificity, with structural and biochemical validation.

item.title: Community Analysis of PKA: A Dynamic View of Kinase Architecture
item.description: Notes on a 2014 PNAS paper analyzing PKA dynamics through community analysis.

item.title: CASK Functions as a Mg²⁺-Independent Neurexin Kinase
item.description: The study redefines CASK as an active Mg²⁺-independent kinase that phosphorylates neurexin, integrating scaffolding and enzymatic functions, challenging its previous classification as a pseudokinase.

item.title: CASK Functions as a Mg²⁺-Independent Neurexin Kinase
item.description: The study redefines CASK as an active Mg²⁺-independent kinase that phosphorylates neurexin, integrating scaffolding and enzymatic functions, challenging its previous classification as a pseudokinase.
